function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excluded areas may have different socioeconomic variables, potentially biasing the results.","Impact":"Potential bias in the study results.","Mitigation":"Conduct a comparative analysis of socioeconomic variables in excluded areas to assess potential bias.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data visualization techniques.","People":"Researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."},{"Description":"Lack of individual-level socioeconomic data limited detailed study of mechanisms at work.","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the impact of socioeconomic variables on the study outcomes.","Mitigation":"Collect individual-level socioeconomic data for future studies.","Technologies":"Data collection tools, survey instruments.","People":"Research team, data collection team.","Owner":"Research team, data collection team."},{"Description":"Decrease in testing rate in the most deprived areas signals a deterioration in access to preventive measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and higher incidence in deprived areas.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions to improve access to testing and preventive measures in deprived areas.","Technologies":"Mobile testing facilities, community outreach programs.","People":"Public health authorities, local community organizations.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government."}]}
